Specialty Commercial and Industrial Doors » Fire Station Doors

Fire Station Doors

Model 811 Fire Station Doors

With over 30 years experience in the garage door industry we have developed the perfect product for your fire station. The Hurricane Master model 811 garage doors has specifically been developed for Fire Stations. Standard features include heavy duty hinges and rollers as well as high cycle springs all to ensure the doors will perform when you need them most.

We have developed a Patented Full Vision Garage Door that allows the placement of lexan within the entire door that allows you to showcase the fire equipment while protecting it from the elements meeting Dade County Product Approval for wind and impact ensuring that our first responders have the protection they need as well.

It is our company policy to expedite replacement parts for any municipality to ensure down time is at a minimum.
